<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>: PrintWriter out = response.getWriter();
           out.write("Hello World!");
<<<explanation>>>: The PrintWriter.write() method is used to write a string to the output stream. In this example, we are creating a PrintWriter object using the response.getWriter() method and then using the write() method to write the string "Hello World!" to the output stream. This will send the string as the response to the client.
